stateDiagram

INITIAL

INITIAL : INITIAL

INITIAL : enter / #123; obj.swellSpeed = 2#59; #125;

SLEEPING

SLEEPING : SLEEPING

SLEEPING : enter / #123; obj.swellSpeed = 2#59; #125;

state PATROL {

        PATROL_MARCH

        PATROL_MARCH : PATROL_MARCH

        PATROL_MARCH : enter / #123; obj.swellSpeed = 4#59; #125;

        PATROL_MARCH : enter / #123; obj.stallTracker.reset()#59; #125;

        PATROL_MARCH : do / #123; obj.stallTracker.update()#59; #125;

        PATROL_MARCH : do / #123; obj.doPatrolMarch()#59; #125;

        PATROL_END_DELAY

        PATROL_END_DELAY : PATROL_END_DELAY

        PATROL_END_DELAY : enter / #123; timer.set(0.5)#59; #125;

        PATROL_END_HOP

        PATROL_END_HOP : PATROL_END_HOP

        PATROL_END_HOP : enter / #123; obj.smallVerticalHop()#59; #125;

        state "$initial_state" as PATROL.(InitialState)

}

JUMP_AROUND

JUMP_AROUND : JUMP_AROUND

JUMP_AROUND : enter / #123; obj.swellSpeed = 8#59; #125;

JUMP_AROUND : enter / #123; timer.set(rand(4, 6))#59; #125;

JUMP_AROUND : do / #123; obj.jumpAround()#59; #125;

HUNTING

HUNTING : HUNTING

HUNTING : enter / #123; obj.swellSpeed = 30#59; #125;

HUNTING : enter / #123; timer.set(rand(5,15))#59; #125;

HUNTING : enter / #123; obj.stallTracker.reset()#59; #125;

HUNTING : do / #123; obj.stallTracker.update()#59; #125;

HUNTING : do / #123; obj.doHuntPlayer()#59; #125;

HUNTING : HEARD_SHOT

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

Enemy1Sm --> HUNTING : DAMAGED

Enemy1Sm --> JUMP_AROUND : HEARD_SHOT

INITIAL --> PATROL : do [obj.playerDist() <= 8]

SLEEPING --> JUMP_AROUND : do [obj.playerDist() <= 8]

PATROL_MARCH --> PATROL_END_DELAY : do [obj.isPatrolEnd()]

PATROL_END_DELAY --> PATROL_END_HOP : do [timer.elapsed()]

PATROL_END_HOP --> PATROL_MARCH : do [obj.groundObject] / #123; obj.patrolTurn()#59; #125;

PATROL.(InitialState) --> PATROL_MARCH

JUMP_AROUND --> SLEEPING : do [timer.elapsed()]

JUMP_AROUND --> HUNTING : do [obj.playerDist() <= 4]

JUMP_AROUND --> HUNTING : HEARD_SHOT

HUNTING --> SLEEPING : PLAYER_DEAD

HUNTING --> JUMP_AROUND : do [timer.elapsed()]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> INITIAL
Events
